name: Coliseum
description: A massive coliseum serves as the ultimate venue for entertainment and spectacle, offering opportunities for glory and political influence, but the focus on spectacle can be both inspiring and dehumanizing. The grand scale creates opportunities for mass influence and entertainment, while the association with violence and spectacle can attract both crowds and controversy.
atmosphere: Massive stone arches rise in towering tiers around the sandy arena floor while underground passages connect to gladiator cells. Ancient stone steps worn smooth by countless spectators lead to tiered seating. The air carries echoes of roaring crowds and spilled blood. Imperial boxes overlook the arena with ornate decorations.
